d.f: `男子~`由於~`經濟~`窮困~`或~`其他~`原因~，`同意~`婚~`後~`住~`入~`女方~`家~，`成為~`女方~`家庭~`的~`成員~。`有時~`約定~`婚生子女~`隨~`母~`姓~，`或~`是~`第一~`個子~`女~`隨~`母~`姓~。陸⃝`也~`作~「`倒插門~」。

Deutsch: in die Familie der Braut einheiraten und deren Familiennamen annehmen  (V)
English: to go and live with one's wife's family, in effect becoming a member of her family
